PvtSNc.Description: Private subnet for confidential apps in us-east-1c CIDR: 10.168.136.0/23

PvtSNd.Description: Private subnet for confidential apps in us-east-1d CIDR: 10.168.134.0/23

PvtSNe.Description: Private subnet for confidential apps in us-east-1e CIDR: 10.168.132.0/23

NATaccessSG.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid NAT Security Group.

CheckMKSG.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid NAT Security Group.

PemKey.Description: Name of and existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance

InstanceProfileUpdateServer.Description: Instance Profile Name for Update Server

Fn::Join:
<script>
mkdir \temp
cd \temp
powershell "Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'https://www.splunk.com/bin/splunk/DownloadActivityServlet?architecture=x86_64&platform=windows&version=7.0.2&product=universalforwarder&filename=splunkforwarder-7.0.2-03bbabbd5c0f-x64-release.msi&wget=true' -OutFile 'C:/temp/splunkforwarder.msi'"
msiexec.exe /i splunkforwarder.msi SPLUNK_APP="SplunkLightForwarder" FORWARD_SERVER="splunkindex.na.sysco.net:9997" DEPLOYMENT_SERVER="splunkdeploy.na.sysco.net:8089" AGREETOLICENSE=Yes /passive
powershell timeout 60
"C:\Program Files\SplunkUniversalForwarder\bin\splunk" add forward-server splunkindex.na.sysco.net:9997 -auth admin:changeme
net stop SplunkForwarder
"C:\Program Files\SplunkUniversalForwarder\bin\splunk" clone-prep-clear-config
del /F/Q "C:\Program Files\SplunkUniversalForwarder\var\log\splunk\*"
</script>
<powershell>
$size = (Get-PartitionSupportedSize -DiskNumber 4 -PartitionNumber 2)
Resize-Partition -DiskNumber 4 -PartitionNumber 2 -Size $size.SizeMax
$size = (Get-PartitionSupportedSize -DiskNumber 5 -PartitionNumber 2)
Resize-Partition -DiskNumber 5 -PartitionNumber 2 -Size $size.SizeMax
Rename-Computer -NewName MS238CPODSQL01s -Restart
</powershell>
